title: Bobby’s Bachelor Party Controversy + Lunchbox Spills The Tea on Scuba Steve: Called A Woman A Man… + Bobby’s American Idol Origin Story
itunes:title: Bobby’s Bachelor Party Controversy + Lunchbox Spills The Tea on Scuba Steve: Called A Woman A Man… + Bobby’s American Idol Origin Story
description:
Bobby addresses the controversy over him wanting to plan his own bachelor party instead of having Eddie (his best man) do it. Lunchbox calls out Scuba Steve for something he heard him say in the Glass Room. Have you ever wondered how Bobby landed the gig as in-house mentor on American Idol? Listener Billy called in to find out why and Bobby shared the failure he has that led to him getting it!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
